import React, { Component } from 'react' import { getById } from './carsData/carsDataRes'; import cartCarsBmw from './cartCarsBmw.css' import Aos from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css' export class carS extends Component { state = { shippingPrice: 1354, loading: true, product: {} } componentDidMount() { var RandomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 500) + 200; const id = this.props.match.params.id; getById(id) .then(product => { setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ product, loading: false }); }, RandomNumber); }) Aos.init(); } render() { const RandomFeesNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) + .9; if (this.state.loading) return
; return (

{this.state.product.name}

${parseInt(this.state.product.price)}

Shipping Price : ${this.state.shippingPrice}

Car Price : $ {this.state.product.price}

Fees : $ {RandomFeesNum}

Total Price : ${parseInt(this.state.product.price) + this.state.shippingPrice + RandomFeesNum}

Billing Address

Payment

) } } export default carS
